info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 515 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Wisdom to near Salmon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts near 50 mph. SOURCE...NWS employee. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wisdom, Jackson, Wise River, Polaris, Dewey and Fishtrap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
